name: Ruin Runner (Sezylrin, Shiva23, Xero8252, EdoardoMenon)
description:
Collect power-ups to help you avoid the ghosts that will chase you if they see you. Collect enough coins to spawn a key, and use those keys to escape the maze! The further you progress, the more keys it will take to open the door. Do you have what it takes?

W A S D / Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar  - Select
